verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Furahini watu wote kwani Kristu kafufuka leo
furahini furahini ,Kristu kafufuka leo Kristu

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
aleluya aleluya Kristu amefufuka aleluya ,
Kristu amefufuka aleluya

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1.Muda wa alfajiri amefufuka ameshinda mauti mwana wa Mungu

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2.Kaburini hayumo amefufuka ,mlango wa Mbingu sasa ni wazi

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3.Mwokozi Bwana wetu amefufuka tufufufke kwa nuru yake Mungu
